Text: One, two, three, four! One, two, three, four!
Ack...!
Two, two, three, four! Two, two, three, four!
M-My head feels heavy—

Don't focus on the bottle on your head! Pretend it
doesn't exist!
Focus on your torso—don't let your core waver!

Lambda's a different person when she's training
others...!
Ichi! Ni! San! Shi! Go! Roku! Shichi! Hachi!
Did she just change the rhythm?!
Shadow! Power! Shadow! Power!
What's with that call out?!
Now turn and strike a pose!
Huh? Oh!
Ahh?!
Oww...

Too sloppy! You're leaning to the side! Keep your
spine perpendicular to the floor! Ground yourself!
...Is this really socializing?!

Of course it is! Lady Alpha and Lady Zeta created
this lesson based on Master Shadow's Shadow Wisdom!

It's part of a "cool and spicy" lesson plan by the
two of them! She who masters her torso, masters
the shadow method of socializing—the Shadow
Power way!
What the hell kinda plan is that?!

Don't mock practical lessons just because you know
how to bury your head in a book—you naive,
sheltered country elf!
Hey, Lambda, are you ok...?!

...Aren't you going a little overboard?! Besides, I
wasn't even raised in the countryside!

If you have time to whine and moan, then go refill
your bottle! Put it back on your head and do ten sets
of walking and turning without spilling a single
drop!
Mess it up once, and you start all over again!
Hey! There's no way I can do that—
Then keep doing it until you can! Or else die trying!
Damn it... Fine, I'll do it!
...Lambda's pretty tough on her.
Oh, I don't think so.

She's usually a lot harsher. She refers to the new
Garden recruits as "vermin."

I see. So it's a role she's playing... As upset as
Epsilon is, she's following Lambda's instructions.

Epsilon is a respectful girl at her core, so she
grasps that Lambda is her superior when it comes
to the hierarchy of this lesson.

Besides, she understands—both mentally and
theoretically—that the skills she gains in these
lessons are essential to her success in the
Oriana Kingdom.
She's pouring her heart and soul into this mission.
Epsilon...!

Ichi...ni...san...shi...! Shadow...Power...Shadow...
Power...!
Huff...huff...
I-I made it to the top!

I did it without relying on slime or magic while
maintaining my bodysuit!

...Seriously, though, what part of climbing a cliff
is a lesson in socializing?!

What a beautiful view... I can't believe I climbed
all the way from down there.
There are some things you only see by climbing.

You need an unwavering mind and body to climb; that
form is only possible with a strong torso!

My training was meant to be for my socializing
abilities, but even my combat posture is more
stable. My control of magic has also improved.

In other words, by training my torso, I increased my
focus in a way that applies to all aspects of life!

This focus...goes far beyond the social setting! With
this, I can do and be anything!
Pianist Shiron. We've set the stage for your debut.

A garden party for aristocrats to enjoy tea and
pleasantries, hosted by the Midgar Kingdom
Branch of the MNA.

One of the pianists in residence is returning to
their hometown, so I asked Beta to ensure you
were on the program.
Ack... You asked Beta?

Do you have a problem with that? This will be the
ideal venue with plenty of the Oriana Kingdom's
aristocracy in attendance.

No problem at all! Thank you, Gamma! I'll make the
most of this opportunity!

By daring to perform in formal attire, your audience
will experience the discovery of a diamond in the
rough more vividly.

Your confident ladylike behavior lurking beneath your
casual appearance will tug at the heartstrings of
those sensitive aristocrats.

Lady Epsilon, your demeanor has much improved. I beg
your forgiveness for my constant rude behavior during
your lessons.

Lambda... Heheh. Don't worry about it! Just promise
me one thing...

That you'll be my number one fan when I make my debut
as a pianist!
Lady Epsilon... Of course! Gladly!
